titles.title: Electing a certain Member to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.
Electing a certain Member to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

action.text: Without objection, the Chair laid before the House H.Res. 954.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Oversight and Reform

bill.summary: This resolution elects a specified Member to the following House Committees: (1) Oversight and Reform, and (2) Small Business.
